0.4.name: wordpress/shortcode-get-child-list
0.4.description:
With this plug-in, you can use shortcodes to output list of children pages or sitemap. Write following shortcode in your post text.

Generate a sitemap : [get_sitemap] Generate a list of child and descendant pages: [get_childlist]

You can also customize output with optional arguments:

[get_childlist id="parentID (optional)" add="additional element (optional)" exclude="exclude page by id (optional, e.g. exclude="34,123,35,23")" exclude_by_slug="exclude page by slug (optional, e.g. exclude_by_slug="test,hoge,home")]
